sql-set.sql: select tc.table_name tableName, tc.column_name colName, case tc.nullable when 'Y' then 1 else 0 end canNull from ALL_CONSTRAINTS r, ALL_CONSTRAINTS p, ALL_CONS_COLUMNS cc, ALL_TAB_COLUMNS tc where 1=1 and r.owner = sys_context('USERENV','SESSION_SCHEMA') and p.owner = sys_context('USERENV','SESSION_SCHEMA') and cc.owner = sys_context('USERENV','SESSION_SCHEMA') and tc.owner = sys_context('USERENV','SESSION_SCHEMA') and r.r_constraint_name = p.constraint_name and cc.constraint_name = r.constraint_name and cc.table_name = tc.table_name and cc.column_name = tc.column_name and r.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'R' and p.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'P' and p.table_name = upper( ? )

select tc.table_name fromTableName, tc.column_name fromColName, case tc.nullable when 'Y' then 1 else 0 end fromCanNull, p.table_name toTableName from ALL_CONSTRAINTS r, ALL_CONSTRAINTS p, ALL_CONS_COLUMNS cc, ALL_TAB_COLUMNS tc where 1=1 and r.owner = sys_context('USERENV','SESSION_SCHEMA') and p.owner = sys_context('USERENV','SESSION_SCHEMA') and cc.owner = sys_context('USERENV','SESSION_SCHEMA') and tc.owner = sys_context('USERENV','SESSION_SCHEMA') and r.r_constraint_name = p.constraint_name and cc.constraint_name = r.constraint_name and cc.table_name = tc.table_name and cc.column_name = tc.column_name and r.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'R' and p.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'P'

select column_name name, data_type type, case when nullable = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end canNull, column_id nomer from ALL_TAB_COLUMNS where owner = sys_context('USERENV','SESSION_SCHEMA') and table_name = upper( ? ) order by column_id

SELECT cols.column_name FROM all_constraints cons, all_cons_columns cols WHERE cols.table_name = upper( ? ) and cons.owner = sys_context('USERENV','SESSION_SCHEMA') AND cons.constraint_type = 'P' AND cons.constraint_name = cols.constraint_name AND cons.owner = cols.owner ORDER BY cols.position
